DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomized control trial investigate impact educational bidirectional text message reminder gluten free diet adherence among adolescent young adult celiac disease age 12-24 . Participants complete series online questionnaires assess quality life , patient activation , celiac symptom , self report dietary adherence begin end study . Participants also blood drawn measure Tissue Transglutaminase IgA ( TTG IgA ) antibody Deamidated Gliadin Peptide IgA ( DGP IgA ) begin end study . Lab draw do locally , cost participant . Patients randomized intervention control group base enrollment TTG IgA . Intervention group receive 45 unique text message 3 month study . A gift card provide participation study .
DOC.brief_title: Text Message Intervention Improve Adherence Adolescents Young Adults With Celiac Disease
